channel.title: Source on Gickup Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Source on Gickup Docs

item.title: Github
item.description: 1 github: 2 - token: some-token 3 token_file: token.txt 4 user: some-user 5 username: your-user 6 password: your-password 7 ssh: true 8 sshkey: /path/to/key 9 exclude: # this excludes the repos "foo" and "bar" 10 - foo 11 - bar 12 include: # this includes the repo "foobar" 13 - foobar 14 excludeorgs: # this excludes repos from the organizations "foo" and "bar" 15 - foo 16 - bar 17 includeorgs: # this includes repos from the organizations "foo1" and "bar1" 18 - foo1 19 - bar1 20 wiki: true 21 starred: true 22 filter: 23 lastactivity: 1y 24 stars: 100 25 excludearchived: true 26 languages: 27 - go 28 - whatever token: your github token.

item.title: Gitea
item.description: 1 gitea: 2 - token: some-token 3 token_file: token.txt 4 url: http(s)://url-to-gitea 5 user: some-user 6 username: your-user 7 password: your-password 8 ssh: true 9 sshkey: /path/to/key 10 exclude: # this excludes the repos "foo" and "bar" 11 - foo 12 - bar 13 include: # this includes the repo "foobar" 14 - foobar 15 excludeorgs: # this excludes repos from the organizations "foo" and "bar" 16 - foo 17 - bar 18 includeorgs: # this includes repos from the organizations "foo1" and "bar1" 19 - foo1 20 - bar1 21 wiki: true 22 starred: true 23 filter: 24 lastactivity: 1y 25 stars: 100 26 excludearchived: true 27 languages: 28 - go 29 - whatever token: your gitea token.

item.title: Gogs
item.description: 1 gitea: 2 - token: some-token 3 token_file: token.txt 4 url: http(s)://url-to-gogs 5 user: some-user 6 username: your-user 7 password: your-password 8 ssh: true 9 sshkey: /path/to/key 10 exclude: # this excludes the repos "foo" and "bar" 11 - foo 12 - bar 13 include: # this includes the repo "foobar" 14 - foobar 15 excludeorgs: # this excludes repos from the organizations "foo" and "bar" 16 - foo 17 - bar 18 includeorgs: # this includes repos from the organizations "foo1" and "bar1" 19 - foo1 20 - bar1 21 wiki: true 22 filter: 23 lastactivity: 1y 24 stars: 100 token: your gogs token.

item.title: Gitlab
item.description: 1 gitlab: 2 - token: some-token 3 token_file: token.txt 4 url: http(s)://url-to-gitlab 5 user: some-user 6 username: your-user 7 password: your-password 8 ssh: true 9 sshkey: /path/to/key 10 exclude: # this excludes the repos "foo" and "bar" 11 - foo 12 - bar 13 include: # this includes the repo "foobar" 14 - foobar 15 excludeorgs: # this excludes repos from the organizations "foo" and "bar" 16 - foo 17 - bar 18 includeorgs: # this includes repos from the organizations "foo1" and "bar1" 19 - foo1 20 - bar1 21 wiki: true 22 filter: 23 lastactivity: 1y 24 stars: 100 25 excludearchived: true 26 languages: 27 - go 28 - whatever token: your gitlab token.

item.title: Bitbucket
item.description: 1 bitbucket: 2 - url: http(s)://url-to-bitbucket 3 user: some-user 4 username: your-user 5 password: your-password 6 ssh: true 7 sshkey: /path/to/key 8 exclude: # this excludes the repos "foo" and "bar" 9 - foo 10 - bar 11 include: # this includes the repo "foobar" 12 - foobar 13 filter: 14 lastactivity: 1y url: if empty, https://bitbucket.org is used. user: the user you want to clone the repositories from. if you want to get everything from your user, leave out the user parameter and just use the token.

item.title: Onedev
item.description: 1 onedev: 2 - token: some-token 3 token_file: token.txt 4 url: http(s)://url-to-onedev 5 user: some-user 6 username: your-user 7 password: your-password 8 ssh: true 9 sshkey: /path/to/key 10 exclude: # this excludes the repos "foo" and "bar" 11 - foo 12 - bar 13 include: # this includes the repo "foobar" 14 - foobar 15 excludeorgs: # this excludes repos from the organizations "foo" and "bar" 16 - foo 17 - bar 18 includeorgs: # this includes repos from the organizations "foo1" and "bar1" 19 - foo1 20 - bar1 21 filter: 22 lastactivity: 1y token: your onedev token.

item.title: Sourcehut
item.description: 1 sourcehut: 2 - token: some-token 3 token_file: token.txt 4 url: http(s)://url-to-sourcehut 5 user: some-user 6 username: your-user 7 password: your-password 8 ssh: true 9 sshkey: /path/to/key 10 exclude: # this excludes the repos "foo" and "bar" 11 - foo 12 - bar 13 include: # this includes the repo "foobar" 14 - foobar 15 excludeorgs: # this excludes repos from the organizations "foo" and "bar" 16 - foo 17 - bar 18 includeorgs: # this includes repos from the organizations "foo1" and "bar1" 19 - foo1 20 - bar1 21 wiki: true 22 filter: 23 lastactivity: 1y token: your onedev token.

item.title: Any
item.description: 1 any: 2 - token: some-token 3 token_file: token.txt 4 url: url-to-any-repo 5 username: your-user 6 password: your-password 7 ssh: true 8 sshkey: /path/to/key 9 - url: can-also-be-a-local-path-to-a-bare-repo token: Token of the hoster. It can also be an environment variable. token_file: alternatively, specify the token in a file, relative to current working directory when executed. url: can be https, http or ssh. Could also be a local bare repository username: user that will be used for the clone process.
